description.full: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Racing action like never before, on and off the tracks!  Break free from the ovals and explode onto the pavements, beaches and off-road areas of some of the most beloved NASCAR® sanctioned race tracks, taking on some of the best drivers NASCAR has to offer.
description.short: Racing action like never before, on and off the tracks!  Break free from the ovals and explode onto the pavements, beaches and off-road areas of some of the most beloved NASCAR® sanctioned race tracks, taking on some of the best drivers NASCAR has to offer.
